Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett is leaning toward the Yankees for the match on Saturday, September 7, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Wrigley Field with Javier Assad (7-4, 3.21 ERA) facing Clarke Schmidt (5-3, 2.52 ERA)
Others: The Yankees are 80-60 and the Cubs are 72-68, the Yankees vs Cubs game will be the second installment in a three-game series
